original_text: The fat of an animal that dies of itself and the fat of one that is torn by beasts may be put to any other use, but on no account shall you eat it.
korean_text: 스스로 죽은 것의 기름이나 짐승에게 찢긴 것의 기름은 다른 데는 쓰려니와 결단코 먹지는 말지니라

sentences.original_text: The fat of an animal that dies of itself
and the fat of one that is torn by beasts
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 짐승에게 찢겨 죽은 동물의 기름은

sentences.original_text: may be put to any other use
but on no account shall you eat it
